guiFX

Class Validator

  • java.lang.Object
    • guiFX.Validator

  • public class Validator
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is used for error checking and validation of the input fields in the GUI

      Validator()

      • validatePort

        public static boolean validatePort(javafx.scene.control.TextField textField)
        This method checks the port number from the GUI TextField object. It will print an error message and highlight the box if it is not a valid port number
        Parameters:
        textField - - port number TextField
        Returns:
        True - the port number is valid
